name: Solar System my first game
description:
This Is my First Work on Unity Game Development.

I made Solar System Simulation which includes following planets.

1. SUN

2. Earth with Moon revolving the Sun

3. Mercury

4. Venus

5. and Mars

I added start Comet with the help of Prefabs

I added sound for all planets with 3d effects

I add material to all planets

I add screen shots my game 

credits

Farrukh Farooq
